alert.note: Alert for Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 3:30PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Elko County through 400 PM PDT... At 330 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Pine Valley, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Emigrant Mine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
